title: The Biker Next Door
description: Hailey Paige found her dream home at last, thinking that this will be the start of something wonderful. That was all crushed when she found out that her neighbor was a biker name Brad.Brad Matthews enjoys hanging with his biker buddies and is shocked as well as intrigued to meet his neighbor who is nothing more than a spitfire of a woman with a nice butt to match the rest of her amazing full figured body.Watch as two people who tend to make each otherâ€™s lives a living hell soon realize that opposites do attract and the attraction seems to get even hotter.
author: Jamallah Bergman
